## getLang variable

Function that takes in a [HeadConfig](./yext-sites-scripts.headconfig.md) interface and a props, and returns the lang value that will be set on the HTML tag.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getLang: (headConfig: HeadConfig | undefined, props: any) => string;
```
